body.p: In your note of Wednesday last , You ask for the name of a man who was in my employ & who had saved some of your sheep:—

This man’s name is Joshua Lear—he is still in my employ (himself and wife living with me as servants.)—I suppose, by your enquiry, you may be thinking of rewarding him—but I question whether he did more than his bare duty (under the circumstances).
